definitions: on the basis of random choice or personal whim, rather than any reason or system

examples.text: recurrent infection is arbitrarily defined as three or more infections a year

shortDefinitions: on basis of random choice or personal whim

definitions: without restraint in the use of authority; autocratically

examples.text: everyone has the right not to be arbitrarily detained

shortDefinitions: without restraint in use of authority; autocratically
